posts.title: Successorator
description: Led a team of six to develop Success List, an Android task management app, leveraging Java, XML, and SQLite for seamless UI design and efficient persistent data storage
Practiced Agile development with Behavior-Driven Development (BDD), enabling iterative delivery, enhanced team collaboration, and streamlined development cycles.

posts.title: Vymsical Music Guessing Game
posts.description: Developed an interactive music quiz game using Next.js.

posts.title: Water Purity Tester
posts.description: Developed a ESP32 Water Purity Testing System and Flask backend server with SQLite database.

posts.title: Sliding Window Protocol & Packet Forwarding Router
description: Implemented a C-based transport-layer protocol adhering to RFC 2001, incorporating TCP congestion control mechanisms: Slow Start, Congestion Avoidance, Fast Retransmit, and Fast Recovery.

Reduced latency by 30% through optimized retransmission strategies, adaptive timeouts, and selective retransmission, ensuring 100% reliability under a 0.9 packet loss rate, validated through extensive edge-case testing.
Developed robust error-handling mechanisms, including ICMP Host/Network/Port Unreachable, as well as ARP timeout-based recovery, validated 95% of edge cases in dynamic routing tests.

posts.title: Extreme World
description: Developed a 3D cartoon-style MMORPG in Unity using C# and backend services using .Net Framework, integrating SQL Server for robust data management. Implemented seamless scene transitions (main city, wilderness, and instances) and diverse gameplay mechanics with three character classes.
Designed and integrated item management, backpack systems, shop system, equipment handling, and quest progression, enhancing gameplay depth and user engagement.
Optimized data storage with a bit array, reducing backpack state storage requirements by 8x in the database.
